Name: Mrs Robinson #1
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add next four ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.
Review: Rich raspberry fruit laced with bourbon.
History: Created in 2000 by Max Warner at Long Bar, Sanderson, London, England.
